# CLI Command Examples for Testing

## Init Command
pylight init --name myproject --path ./myproject

## Start Command
pylight start --config config.yaml --port 8000 --host 0.0.0.0

## Migrate Command
pylight migrate --config config.yaml --revision head

## Generate Command
pylight generate --table users --methods GET,POST

## Reflect Command
pylight reflect --config config.yaml --database-url postgresql://localhost/testdb
